name: Night Darkness
description:
You have to take control of one of the most famous mercenaries and complete a special mission to save humanity from certain death.

Explore the island where you found yourself after a helicopter crash and reveal all the secrets that are stored here. But beware of the enemies that await you on your way, because this island is inhabited by a variety of drones that yearn for your death.

Features:
Eliminate the threat alone. Play a small campaign in single player mode.
Explore a new hostile world.
Embark on an exciting journey and save humanity.
